```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggpubr)
```

```{r}
ptb <- read_csv('../data/cleaned_patients/diet_patients_97.csv')

meta <- read_csv('../data/cleaned_stool/all_samples_meta_p2d_fg9_updated.csv') %>% 
  mutate(timebin = cut_width(sdrt, 7, boundary=0, closed = 'left')) %>% 
  mutate(intensity = factor(intensity, levels = c('nonablative','reduced','ablative')))

faith <- read_tsv('../data/cleaned_diet_data/FINAL_97_faith_pd/alpha-diversity.tsv') %>% 
  separate(X1, into = c('mrn', 'fdrt'), sep = 'd', convert = T)  %>% 
  mutate(mrn = as.numeric(str_replace(mrn, 'P',''))) 
```

```{r}
# make the second row of th figure 
dat <- read_csv('../data/diet_pt_daily_cal_and_faith.csv')


alpha_val <- 0.2
cal_ <- dat %>% 
  ggscatter(x = 'fdrt', y = 'cal', alpha = alpha_val, 
            xlab = '',
            ylab = 'Caloric intake',
            add = "loess", color = 'maroon',
            add.params = list(color = "brown", fill = "darkgray", size = 2), 
            conf.int = TRUE) +
  xlim(-10, 50) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(-10, 50, 10)) + theme(aspect.ratio=1)
cal_
```


```{r}
cal_split <- dat %>% 
  ggscatter(x = 'fdrt', y = 'cal', alpha = alpha_val, 
            color = 'intensity', palette = 'lancet',
            xlab = 'Day relative to transplant',
            ylab = 'Caloric intake',
            add = "loess", 
            conf.int = TRUE) +
  xlim(-10, 50) +
  theme(legend.position = 'none') + 
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(-10, 50, 10)) + theme(aspect.ratio=1)
cal_split
```

```{r}
diet_alpha <- faith %>%

diet_alpha
```

```{r}
faith_split <- dat %>%

             alpha = alpha_val,

            #size = 1,
            ylab = 'Diet alpha diversity',
```

```{r}
stool_alpha <- meta %>% 
  mutate(log_div = log(simpson_reciprocal)) %>% 
  ggscatter(x = 'sdrt', y = 'simpson_reciprocal', alpha = alpha_val, 
            xlab = 'Day relative to transplant',
            ylab = 'Microbiome alpha diversity',
            add = "loess", color = 'darkgoldenrod',
            add.params = list(color = "darkgoldenrod4", fill = "darkgray", size = 2), 
            conf.int = TRUE) +
  xlim(-10, 50) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = seq(-10, 50, 10)) + theme(aspect.ratio=1)
stool_alpha
```



```{r}
alpha <- plot_grid(cal_, diet_alpha, stool_alpha, cal_split, faith_split,
                   byrow = T,
          nrow = 2, 
          align = 'hv',
          #rel_heights = c(1,1),
          axis = 'blrt')  +
  ggsave('../figs/alhpa_ch.pdf', width = 10, height = 7)
alpha 
```

## the timeline plot 

```{r}
dtb <- read_csv('../data/cleaned_diet_data/FINAL_97_with_code_all_foods_drt_with_EN_finalized.csv') %>% 
  group_by(mrn, fdrt) %>% 
  summarise(cal =  sum(Calories_kcal)) %>% 
  ungroup() %>% 
  mutate(food = T)

stb <- read_csv('../data/cleaned_stool/selected_stool_samples_ALL_abx.csv') %>% 
  mutate(stool = F)
```

```{r}
dtb %>% 
  ggscatter(x = 'fdrt', y = 'food') +
  geom_point(data = stb, aes(x = sdrt, y = stool)) +
  facet_wrap(~mrn, scales = 'free') +
  labs(y = '') +
  theme_light() +
  ggsave('../figs/timeline_pair.pdf', width = 8, height = 6)
```
